scripts.build: esbuild src/background.js src/bulk.js --bundle --outdir=dist && copyfiles -u 1 src/*.html src/*.css dist
scripts.zip: rm -rf release && mkdir -p release/package/dist && npm run build && cp -r dist/* release/package/dist/ && cp manifest.json release/package/ && mkdir -p release/package/icons && cp -r icons/* release/package/icons/ && cd release/package && zip -r ../extension.zip . && cd ../..
